name: DUO
description: DUO is an arcade game designed from the ground up for the virtual reality. Now you can immerse yourself in a virtual world with classic retro game."This could be Vive’s best brick breaker. Give it a go.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A retro still game easy to play, alot of fun. Hopefully the developer keeps working on it and adds some additional content for it. Overall a thumbs up.
